tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was referred to Dr. Gangi Reddy  TK by one of my friends. I have consulted him 2 weeks back with my X-ray and Spirometry Report done at another clinic. I had some issues noticed in the X-ray which he explained to me clearly saying that nothing to worry, it can be treated with medicines. He did not insist on any expensive scan or other tests. He is a polite and approachable doctor. I am  really happy and impressed by his treatment . He has prescribed some medications and was asked to review after 2 weeks. I am feeling better now. Highly recommend Dr. Gangi Reddy for Pulmonary related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bronchial Asthma Treatment,Respiratory Conditions,Respiratory tract infection,
review: *** ***** ***** ** ******** *** **** ****** ** ********* *** ******** ***** ** ****** ************************ ************** I had been suffering with wheezing, breathlessness and severe cough for over a month. I tried many medicines before but didn't get relief. One visit to Dr. Gangi Reddy.. his quick diagnosis, detailed explanation, and treatment course show his in-depth knowledge of this subject. I got relief within 3 days of the treatment and much to my surprise the medicines I took had very less side effects and didn't interfere with my day-to-day activities. I will recommend his treatment for any one suffering from severe to acute pulmonary-related complications. His treatment is life-saving!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Reddy is a godsend to us. My father is a Chronic Kidney Disease Patient and was diagnosed with Military Tuberculosis on November 2019 and he was on ATT since then. He was admitted in ICU with serious health conditions and was unconscious for 4 days at a stretch. He wasn‚Äôt able to breathe on his own and was on Oxygen supply but today touchwood he is fine. He was bedridden post his admission in the ICU.  There was a point when we lost hope, but Dr.Reddy didn‚Äôt give up on my father.He goes out of his way to make sure all your questions are answered and he works with you to address the health concerns rather than just telling you what needs to be done. And also he cares for his patients a lot and follows up for regular update. He is very approachable and walked us through every minute details. Today after almost 1.5 years my father has been able to walk around, can breathe easy and there is no sign of TB. When I see my father today its almost unbelievable that he is the same man who was admitted in ICU and was struggling for his life. It feels like a miracle. We as a family can‚Äôt thank Dr. Reddy enough for his relentless support, guidance and encouragement during this entire journey.
reply_text:
His recovery has been heart warming!!
His determination, adherence to theraphy and the way family has trusted doctors and taken care of him has paid rich dividends. 
Firstly as humans and next as doctors, this is what makes us feel good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have asthma from childhood but did not face any severe issues. Mild symptoms used to be easily subdued by general medication. I had a PFT test during the annual health check up to find the lung capacity was below normal and medication was prescribed. I wanted to visit a specialist before taking any long term medication. This is when I visited Dr Gangireddy TK. He explained it very well that there is nothing to worry about such PFT results and it is quite expected for people with mild asthma. Instead of stronger oral medication he suggested me milder inhale medication. I could feel remarkable improvement in my breathing and feel a greater lung capacity after undergoing treatment from him. He is a next gen doctor who will explain the issue in detail and would also encourage you to google more about it to have better understanding (not take medication from Google of course!) and suggest small lifestyle changes that will help and to avoid allergents rather than undergoing medication. I would strongly recommend him for respiratory and allergic issues.
reply_text:
Happy about your quick recovery.
Thanks for the feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Gangi Reddy is very very genuine Doctor. I took my mother almost 2 months back for lungs related problems. With his expertise and diagnosis, he was able to identify root cause of the condition which turned out to be not just limited to lungs but overall autoimmune issues. Before him, we went to several other doctors but no relief. After beginning his treatment, my mother in few days only started to feel much better. He is also very polite and generous and gives sufficient time to explain the plan of treatment to his patient. I highly recommend Dr Gangi Reddy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Gangi Reddy is **** **** *** friendly doctor . I had an acute eye infection and was on steroids before visiting him..then my opthalmologist suggested to visit some pulmonologist, then I came to know about Dr Gangi Reddy. He did some blood tests and it was diagnosed that i have eye TB (tuberculosis).. i was surprised to know about my unique condition. Ever since 2months i am under ATT  (Anti Tuberculosis Treatment) .My eyes have recovered...and i no longer need any steroids.
However, I  need to continue ATT as it is a long term treatment to cure TB which affected my eyes..
I would strongly recomend Dr. Gangi Reddy for his friendly behaviour, explaining me all details and consequences of my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Dr. Gangi Reddy for my mother‚Äôs cough and cold issues,he is very down to earth and sincere doctor who listens and answers to queries patiently,explains the problem and treatment suggested thoroughly that gives confidence on doctor‚Äôs diagnosis as he knows clearly what is the issue and what to do exactly to cure it,thankful to the doctor to help us through our tough times with his experiences,currently consulting him also for my father, surely recommend Dr.Gangi Reddy, thank you Sir!
reply_text: Happy for you. It gives immense pleasure when sick patients recover well. Thanks for the feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Doctor today for my wife‚Äôs breathing related issues. Friendly, Very Approachable and Courteous to discuss the ailment issues with the Doctor. Given clear guidance on the next steps and in turn helped in analysing the root cause of the issues/estimating the degree of severity with clinical results. Additionally, provided extra 6 page material to read through and to build insights on the ailment that patient is suffering through, helped in asking the right questions back during follow up discussion with Doctor. He is very professional, showing empathy and giving confidence to the patient at the end of the visiting session. Overall, Visited with Right Doctor is what we felt after the consultation is done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My father is suffering from Auto Immune disorder and is also having major respiratory issues.  
Doctor took very good time to explain the complication of situation and the treatment steps which will be followed.  Unless there is a need or major infection doctor never advises for medication.
Father present situation is far more stable *** *** ********* *** **** **** ******** **** ******* 
My family is thankful to doctor for the treatment given and all the efforts he has put in to save my father during crisis situation.
Doctor is very much professional and gives utmost care & time for his patients.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Well doctor listens carefully, but i was not satisfied with the diagnosis and treatment, i visited for cough issue which had from 5 days, since i was hearing some snoring sound  i visited him,but he has not confirmed the exact issue, he was consitently saying it was asthma  and gave the inhaler along with two other mwdicine, i was not feeling better with the treatment but it was drying my nose again i had more issue with that, so i decided to visit one more pul doctor in hosur **** **** *** ****** ** ****** * ** ******* ***** *** ********* **** * **** *** *** ******* *** ********* *** ***** * **** ***.  I was not satisfied
reply_text:
Firstly I am happy that you have recovered.
I would have given my opinion after detailed examination n with a clear logic.
But the tablet which u have stated with which ur better is also a tab used in  treatment of asthma.
However inhalers are the preferred choice.
It's upto you to take care of your health.
Choose wisely.

But Dr Gangi Reddy is the best doctor I came across, he follows a holistic approach for treatment which includes patient and caregiver‚Äôs councelling, lifestyle improvements and minimum medicines. He explained the problem and treatment patiently and in detail. I am really grateful to him for helping my mother to get better.
reply_text: Thanks you for sharing your feedback. Best wishes

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was recommended to visit Pulmonologist by another doctor. Doctor checked all my previous reports and checked me and assured me that there is no active TB. Asked me to get one test done to get better assurance. 
He spends time in explaining the issue and comforted me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted Doctor for my kid of 8yrs. She had been suffering with very frequent allergic cold and cough for past 2years. Consulted multiple peadiatricians but could not find out the root cause. She was continuously on medicines for almost 2years and could not eat/sleep/play because of cough. 
I myself had a good experience with Dr.Gangi reddy for my allergic problem. I saw him in Add on scan n labs and consulted for my kid. I spent many sleepless nights with my kid and cried so much for my kid's condition. But just in a matter of 1day doctor's  medicines gave relief to my kid. And now its not recurring. I am so happy to see her eat and sleep properly. 
Cant thank enough doctor for this change. I highly recommend this doctor for any kind of respiratory problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Gangi Reddy for nasal obstruction. The doctor analyses the patient clearly before arriving at a conclusion. The approach to diagnosis was done in a gradual manner. After a few tests it was found that I had DNS and hence referred me to an ENT specialist. Coming to the billing and stuff, I believe the tests conducted were charged a bit more and that's acceptable considering its Bangalore and things are costlier than other metropolitan cities. Overall, I recommend Dr. Gangi Reddy for his positive attitude towards his patients and diagnosing diseases in a systematic manner before arriving at an early conclusion.
reply_text: Thanks. Really happy for you considering the severity of your illness and your recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We met Dr.Gangi Reddy about a year back for my Father's tuberculosis treatment. Since then we continue to come to him in spite of the distance from home and proximity to other big hospitals. He is very friendly, very clear and concise about his diagnosis and treatment plan, detailed communication in simple terms on every step of treatment and reason behind his treatment decisions, open communication on options. Takes time to talk freely to the patient (my father is 74) and make him comfortable on each visit. It was also easy to share records and reports to him to avoid/reduce visits.
We are quite pleased with his treatment and my father recovered well. We would highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you for sharing the feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My mom was down with severe cough and took treatment from multiple doctors , but all were temporary solution , after few days she would be coughing again .  
So then we started searching good pulmonologist in google , practo etc , then we found this doctor , he started the treatment , with in a few days , he found the root cause which is hard to find out .
Kudos to doctor for finding a root cause and proper treatment , today my mom feels much much better and great with his treatment . 

Doctor was so friendly and supportive all the time , specially when mom got hospitalised . also helped us when we had a trouble with insurance .

He is so calm and patient , we were worried because of my mom condition, so during consultation multiple people from family used to be there around her , he never got annoyed, patiently he explained to all of us . 
Grateful to you sir  and your help and kindnessüôèüôè
Strongly recommend to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

When I meet personally I was satisfied the way of talking to the patient how friendliness by Dr. Gangi Reddy Pulmonologist. In the hospital I was treated excellent and Nursing staff and others doctors  were all very helpful. I thank to Dr. Gangi Reddy and others Doctors Nursing Staff, and all hospital staff for giving good treatment and recover from Covid 19

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife was affected with microbacterium abscesses at the lungs. We had no proper treatment on this issue till we met Dr.Gangi Reddy. He diagnosed it well and proper medication for the same. Now my wife is recovering quite well. Apart from his vast knowledge and experience he also is well connected with WHO and other primary world wide institutions. Thus he ensures the world class treatment for his patients. I would like to thank him for his treatment and moral support during our difficult times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Highly terrible experience **** **** ******* Within one minute he said there is no issue. ******* *** ********* ** ****** He even said If you only want medicine go and take nebulizer. *** **** ***** ** ********** *** ******* ** * ********** ******* ** ********* ** ****** *  All this within one minute. Highly demeaning. ******* **** ***** *** ** ***** **** ** **** ** ** * **** ** **** * **** ***** ** * ************* And now I have got a consultation from another doctor **** *** *** ***** **** *** ********** ******** ***** **** ****** ********* ** *******  Highly demeaning. I will never recommend this doctor . **** ******* ** * ******** *** *** ****** *** ****** ** *** ***********
reply_text:
I do empathize with you. But do understand that, we as doctors just can't give medicines without any rationale. 
 My opinion didn't happen in just 1 min, it included a clear patient history and
clinical examination. Your vitals signs and clinical examination was normal.  
I clearly explained you my point of view several times. All these took at least 15 mins. 
Since you were in disagreement, I said our customer care team to return your consultation fees and advice you to consult any other doctor of your choice.
        An acutely breathless patient who would need immediate treatment will not be able to talk 2-3 sentences also comfortably. However throughout the consultation you were conversing well. 
        Kindly introspect yourselves before you give opinions. Be truthful.
Wish you a speedy recovery.
Thanks
